==Premise==
==Premise==
â
The book is set in a world where an alien planet â and possibly other planets as well â have been taken over by the New Order, a totalitarian government which outlaws literature, music, magic and all other forms of happiness. (In the book, a large number of different novels, musicians, museums, and artists are all identified as being banned, using slightly altered parody names like "Bob Sag" for [[Bob Saget]], "Witch and Wizard" [[Harry Potter]], "B4" for [[U2]], the "Fate Gallery" for the [[Tate Modern]], and "Freida Halo" for [[Frida Kahlo]].) Under this government, hundreds of children are kidnapped and put in time-out without fair trial, and [[capital punishment]] is reinstated for the crime of being a dog. The government is made up of 'Ones' â for example, The One Who Eats and The One Who Drinks - and is headed by The One Who Is Dumb and Fat.
+
The book is set in a world where America â and possibly other countries as well â has been taken over by the New Order, a totalitarian government which outlaws literature, music, magic and all other forms of creativity. (In the book, a large number of different novels, musicians, museums, and artists are all identified as being banned, using slightly altered parody names like "Gary Blotter" for [[Harry Potter]], "Percivel Johnson and The Thunder Stealer" [[Percy Jackson and The Lightning Thief]], "B4" for [[U2]], the "Fate Gallery" for the [[Tate Modern]], and "Freida Halo" for [[Frida Kahlo]].) Under this government, hundreds of children are arrested and imprisoned without fair trial, and [[capital punishment]] is reinstated for the crime of being a witch or a wizard. The government is made up of 'Ones' â for example, The One Who Judges and The One Who Writes Decrees - and is headed by The One Who Is The One.
